logging.description: When enabled, console output is mirrored to this channel. Use a channel ID.

conditions.description: Award ONE role to inviter if invitee has ANY ONE of the specified roles. Use roleIds array and/or roleNames array.

thresholdRewards.description: Award ONE rewardRole to inviter when 3+ invitees have ANY ONE of the specified requiredRoles. Each invitee only needs to have one of the required roles to count.
